newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-BRIDGEND BEAT NEWPORT IN WELSH PREMIER OPENER.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-BRIDGEND BEAT NEWPORT IN WELSH PREMIER OPENER.

text.p: Bridgend beat Newport 27-19 (halftime 3-19) in a Welsh premier division match on Sunday.
Newport - Tries: Martyn Llewellyn. Conversions: Shaun Connor. Penalties: Connor 4.
Bridgend - Tries: Jonathan Dodd, Matthew Lewis, Steve Wynn. Conversions: Gareth Cull (3). Penalties: Cull 2.
